dt: {bc}the reflective quality or power of a surface or material

dt.t: … conducting {ldquo}{wi}reflectivity{/wi} tests{rdquo} to see whether Saudi sand when viewed through the goggles creates a sparkling effect that disorients pilots and causes them to send their helicopters careening to the ground.
… there are many examples of luster-decorated ceramics, in which Islamic potters emulated the {wi}reflectivity{/wi} of metalwork by applying metal oxides to white-glazed vessels …
The warming at the surface could be expected to melt snow and ice, reducing the earth's albedo, or {wi}reflectivity{/wi}.

shortdef: the reflective quality or power of a surface or material
